educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: Academy of European Law
educational_organizations_and_universiti.members: Member states of the European Union
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To provide training in European law to legal practitioners.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: Asian Institute of Technology
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To advance education and research in the field of science, engineering, and technology.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: Cerlalc
educational_organizations_and_universiti.members: 21 member states from Latin America and the Caribbean
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To promote book production and reading in the Spanish and Portuguese-speaking regions.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: Commonwealth of Learning
educational_organizations_and_universiti.members: Member states of the Commonwealth of Nations
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To encourage the development and sharing of open learning and distance education knowledge, resources, and technologies.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: EUCLID (university)
educational_organizations_and_universiti.members: Participating governments from around the world
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To deliver quality degree programs to students in the international public service sector.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: European Schools
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To provide a multilingual and multicultural education for children of EU employees.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: European University Institute
educational_organizations_and_universiti.type: International Postgraduate and Doctoral Research Institute
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To conduct research and offer postgraduate level courses in social sciences, humanities, and law.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: IHE Delft Institute for Water Education
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To provide education and research in water management to improve global water sector performance.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: International Bureau of Education
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To advance curriculum development and education standards worldwide.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: International Institute for the Unification of Private Law
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To study needs and methods for modernizing, harmonizing, and coordinating private and in particular commercial law.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: Model United Nations
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To educate participants about civics, effective communication, globalization, and multilateral diplomacy.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: United Nations University
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To contribute, through research and education, to efforts to resolve pressing global problems.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: University for Peace
educational_organizations_and_universiti.members: Member states of the United Nations
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To provide humanity with an international institution of higher education for peace.

educational_organizations_and_universiti.name: World Maritime University
educational_organizations_and_universiti.members: Member states of the International Maritime Organization
educational_organizations_and_universiti.purpose: To build global maritime capacity through advanced education and research.
